description.value: Hidden darkness whispers to you, teaching you secrets of shadow beyond other spellcasters of your tradition. Add @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Shadow Blast]{Shadow Blast}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Shadow Siphon]{Shadow Siphon}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Shadow Walk]{Shadow Walk}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Replicate]{Replicate}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Shadow Army]{Shadow Army}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Shadow Projectile]{Shadow Projectile}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Shadow Raid]{Shadow Raid} to your spell list. You can thus potentially learn these spells even if they aren't normally on your tradition's spell list.
